When I went to DisneyLand they were doing repairs to space mountain’s dome, and had the lights on inside. I’ve seen the bars around the track, the seem really close!

P.S. I’m sure the measured every millimeter of beams to be safe, but it doesn’t look like it when you are flying through it!
